After riding on a bus to get home, something she hadn't had to do in years since before she learnt how to drive, Liz stepped off and momentarily caught sight of Rob's reflection in the vehicle's side mirror. She still couldn't believe this was happening, that Gemma was conducting this 'experiment' with her and her staff. She was a 35-year old married woman and a mother, yet here she was living the life and wearing the clothes of a 21-year old single guy, and one of her subordinates no less. It was the demotion that was also affecting Liz a little, and the fact that she didn't really trust Rob to do her job as a supervisor or to look after her 18-month old son.

"You getting off or not son?" The middle-aged bus driver asked her, getting impatient.

"Huh, sorry, and.. thank you." Liz smiled nervously, before taking the last step off the bus. Getting the piece of paper out of her trouser pocket with Rob's address on it, she confirmed she was in the right area and then headed towards the correct house number on the right street. The breeze around her ears and neck was a reminder that she now longer had her long hair and she kept looking down at herself, attired in Rob's work clothes and sneakers. "This is crazy!" she muttered.

Pausing outside Rob's house, Liz was hesitant to go inside. She wasn't even sure she could pull off being him in front of his parents. But then she reminded herself... she WAS Rob as long as his family and everyone else he knew was concerned. Eventually she shrugged and regained the positive attitude that had served her so well as a supervisor all these years. She opened the front door and went inside, closing the door behind her.

Liz happened to know Rob still lived at home with his parents, and this was confirmed when she cautiously walked into the living room and saw a middle-aged man and woman sat watching TV and enjoying supper. "Hi honey." Liz's temporary new mother, Carol greeted her with a smile.

"Hiya sport, what's up? You look like you've seen a bloody ghost." Her temporary new dad, Trevor then laughed.

"Huh, hey mum, hey dad." Liz muttered nervously.

"There's some hot pot left in the oven if you want some love." Carol smiled at Liz believing her to be her son.

Liz was glad to hear this. What with all that had transpired that night so far, she hadn't thought about her stomach much. A faint growl suddenly reminded her she was very hungry after a day at work. "Thanks mum, sounds nice." Liz smiled, finding her way to the kitchen to get some of the homemade hot pot, which she then took upstairs to her new bedroom, shutting the door behind her for some much needed privacy.

As the other swapped staff members were doing when they got home, Liz stared at Rob's young reflection in a mirror on the wall, mimicking her every move, and she was just astonished at the power of Gemma's device. Letting out a sigh, Liz went back to her meal and started to eat. There's be plenty of time to explore her new surroundings once she had eaten and got comfy. She tried not to worry too much about Ethan in the process.
12123333333132421212131333.title: Liz gets to Rob's home

choices: Emily's Mom welcomes her daughter home.
121233333331324212121313333.content:
After leaving the store, Josh looked at Emily's instructions. "Okay, so I have to take bus 4." He looked around to see if that made any since. "Where in the hell is the bus stop?" He sighed as he continued to look around in order to get a couple more clues. The streets looked bare with only the occasional car passing by. Looking down at himself and the feminine clothing he now wore. From the black yoga pants that seemed to show every curve that a girl would want to show and the light purple tank top that showed Emily's, or rather his bra. "This is ridiculous." He sighed as he fixed it and made his way down the road. No more than 5 minutes later he was able to find the bus stop with little help and like the roads earlier, it was rather vacant too.

Deciding to take a break until the bus arrived, Josh looked in his purse to see what was in there. Looking through, he found Emily's ID, which now had his face on it with all of Emily's information, several tampons that caused him to shudder, a bus pass, and a smart phone. Deciding to be a snoop, Josh pulled out the phone and tried to unlock it. "Hmm, it seems that it's locked by her fingerprint. I wonder." He put his finger on the sensor and found that it worked. "Wow, I didn't think that was going to work." Looking through the apps and noticed that there wasn't anything really interesting. Soon the bus finally arrived, standing up and he noticed that it was bus 4, the exact bus that he was needing to take. The bus slowed and came to a stop. Looking up he found that the driver was a lady in her mid to late 30s.

"Are you going to get on or not, love?" She asked, seeming a little tired from her long shift.

"Yeah, sorry." Josh replied as he got his purse and stepped on the bus. After putting his pass through the sensor, he decided to take a seat behind the driver. Looking up he could see Emily's reflection looking back at him from the rear view mirror. Everything from her dark colored hair that was being held in a ponytail to her curves. Trying to avoid any unneeded attention, Josh kept quiet and tried to keep the bus driver talking to him. It took another 10 to 15 minutes until he got to the stop. "Thank you." He said to the driver as he got off the bus and looked at where he was. Looking at the directions, he found that he was only a couple doors away from the flat that he had, or rather Emily had. "Well here goes nothing." He sighed as he made his way to the building and made his way inside.
121233333331324212121313333.title: Josh gets to Emily's abode.

choices: Josh and Steven's first night as roommates.
1212333333313242121213133332.content:
It was only a few seconds before Josh heard someone moving around in the next room, and he started to panic a little. An intruder? A relative Emily hadn't told him about who was living with her. He edged towards the door to the living room and slowly peeked inside, and his heart resumed it's place when he saw none other than Steven standing in the living room, just removing Jessica's work shirt and revealing the red lace bra stretched across his chest. Josh pushed open the door, and Steven actually jumped and gasped... before recognizing his now 5'5" tall co-worker, even with Emily's dark ponytail on his head and wearing her glasses and clothes. "What are you doing here?" Steven asked, frowning as he teetered in the stiletto ankle boots he hadn't yet taken off.

"What are YOU doing here?" Josh responded. "Emily told me I live here now."

"You can't live here, Jessica said this is where she lives." Steven told him, as he tossed his smaller work shirt to one side. He then sat down and unzipped Jessica boots before taking them off and leaving them beside the couch. It felt good to give his feet some air, but he soon frowned when he looked down and saw his toe nails, painted a crimson red.

Josh scratched his head and felt his ponytail, before speaking again. "You think they're roommates and didn't tell us?" he inquired.

Steven looked around, seeing clothes scattered in various places, including a pair of black & white Converse girl's sneakers that were definitely more Emily's style than Jessica's. "I'd say that's a safe assumption, this is too big a mess for just one girl to make." he joked.

"True." Josh nodded, sighing as he walked over to the couch and sat beside Steven. "Hell of a day huh?" he grumbled.

"Understatement of the year right there." Steven said, idly pulling the scrunchie out of his vibrant ginger hair and letting it fall down around his shoulders. It still felt really weird to him, having had a super short haircut before Gemma did her life swapping thing. Still, he did enjoy not having to wear glasses now, like Josh had to.

"Tomorrow will be even weirder I think." Josh then muttered, getting a silent nod from his friend and co-worker.

There was a moment of silence then, and Steven turned his head to Josh. "First dibs on using the bathroom." he said. "I want a shower!" he added, inhaling and smelling Jessica's 'Impulse' women's body spray again.

Josh just managed a smile. "Okay roomie, go for it." he nodded.
1212333333313242121213133332.title: Emily has a room mate.

choices: Josh and Steven's first night as roommates
12123333333132421212131333323.content:
As everyone was leaving the store for the night, Mark was one of the first to leave. As he stepped out, he kept in mind what Kaysie told him about what to expect. Since they only had one vehicle and Thomas, her 'handsome and lovable' husband, was nice enough to come and pick her up whenever she had to work later than usual. Mark looked for the 'well-loved' red Toyota Corolla. She made sure to tell him that it wasn't much, but they were able to pay it off all by themselves. "Where is he at?" Mark sighed to himself as he walked down the sidewalk until he found the vehicle. As he walked, Mark could notice the 6" of height that he lost and felt the few strands of dark blonde hair that now framed his face.

"Over here, Kay." A male voice called out to somebody. Mark looked across the street and noticed the red Toyota Corolla. It wasn't as bad as what he was expecting and certainly beat taking the bus.

We waved and started to cross the street, almost out of nowhere a car nearly hit him. "Use a crosswalk, you bimbo!" An angry man cried out of a BMW, who had to come to a screeching halt in order to avoid hitting Mark.

"Sorry." Mark squeaked out as he hurriedly finish crossing the road. As he got to the car, Thomas couldn't help but freak out as Mark got into the passenger seat.

"What were you thinking, Kay?" He nearly screamed out. He took Mark's face into his hands a looked him over and when he was sure that he checked everything out, Thomas said in a disturbingly calm manner. "I don't know what I would do if I ever lost you." Mark could see some tears starting to well up in his eyes. "Come on, let's go home." He put the car in drive and started to drive off. As they were driving, Mark would occasionally look in the side mirror to see Kaysie's lovely reflection looking back at him.
12123333333132421212131333323.title: A close call for Mark.

121233333331324212121313333234.content:
"Laugh at me and you die! Got me?" Steven warned Josh as he returned from having a shower. Josh looked up and had to put his hand in front of his mouth when he saw Steven with a towel wrapped around his soaking wet ginger hair atop his head. The now 5'5" man was also wearing one of Jessica's nighties and a pair of fluffy slippers that happened to be pink. He was also wearing a pair of Jessica's light green knickers and a matching bra underneath. "She doesn't own a damn single pair of pyjamas." Steven grumbled. "She's the girliest girl I know."

Josh smirked, looking down at Steven's painted toe nails peeking out of the feminine slippers on his feet, and also at his smooth legs peeking out of his nightie. "You look adorable!" he joked.

"Yeah yeah, whatever! This is humiliating as hell." Steven grumbled, slumping himself down on the couch. "And this stupid hair is gonna take ages to dry." he added, patting the towel on his head. "I know Jessica is gonna flip tomorrow when she sees the mess I've made of it."

Josh had already been rumaging through Emily's wardrobe and drawers and had dug out a pretty unisex looking pair of pyjamas, in a lilac color, and a pair of white flats to wear on his own painted feet. "I could have loaned you some pyjamas, we're about the same size now." Josh mentioned.

"Ahh, don't bother now." Steven sighed. "You know how totally weird it is seeing a girl staring back at you from the mirror, her tits and everything?" Steven then said, shaking his head in disbelief. "I mean don't get me wrong, Jessica is a stunner, but this is taking a lot of adjustment."

"Yes of course I know." Josh nodded, twiddling his long dark hair around his right forefinger. He'd spent the last 10 minutes staring at Emily's cute reflection in the mirror and trying to walk around the flat without her glasses on. It didn't go well.

"I wonder how long Gemma is gonna let this go on for." Steven grumbled again, as he turned the TV on and crossed his legs in a feminine manner.

"We should ask her tomorrow." Josh said, as he got to his feet, ready to take a shower himself. "Until it is over, we make the best of it I suppose." he shrugged. "See you in a bit." he said, grabbing Emily's discarded work shirt and sneakers and sauntering into the bathroom.
121233333331324212121313333234.title: Josh and Steven's first night as roommates

1212333333313242121213133332341.content:
Aaron put the car in park in front of the address that Waggy gave him. He took a deep breath as he looked in the rear view mirror and saw Waggy's reflection meeting his gaze. Taking a deep breath, Aaron started to get out of the car and walk up the stairs to the house that he would be calling home for the night. As he put the key into the lock and opened the door, he was overwhelmed by the mess that greeted him. Waggy made sure to tell him about her two rambunctious children, Jack and Eden, but he was unsure of what to expect until he opened the door. From the dolls and toy trucks that littered the front room, dinner was still on the stove, dirty dishes in the sink, and school uniforms wrinkled laying near an ironing board. He stood there for a minute to take it all in and was blind sided by something attacking both of his legs.

"Mummy's home!" Eden cried out with joy and Aaron looked down to see her attached to his right leg and Jack attached to his left. He couldn't help but smile, given the situation.

"Hello honey." Dave replied as he bent down to grab the two children and leaned in for a kiss. Appalled at what was going on, Aaron quickly turned his head and felt the lips on his cheek. "Sorry about the mess, but I know you'll take care of it. The kids still need their uniforms ironed for tomorrow and the kitchen needs to be cleaned. I know how you like to do it your way."

Aaron was at a loss for words and didn't know what he was going to do. Why did he have to mouth off at Gemma. He sighed as he started to get his bearings. "Umm..." He was at a loss for words.

"I'm going to go to bed and I will tuck the kids in too." Dave answered as he started to go towards the hallway.

"I want Mummy to tuck me in." Eden cried out with her arms outstretched.

"Ok." Aaron replied as he put Waggy's purse down in an empty chair and followed them into the room.
1212333333313242121213133332341.title: Meanwhile, with another swapped employee.

12123333333132421212131333323411.content:
Once in the bathroom, Josh locked the door and looked around. The bathroom was still steamy from Steven's shower and the carpet on the floor was wet in places. He turned the shower on and held his hand under the water for a moment, then he started getting undressed, stripping out of Emily's remaining clothes. And at some point he caught a full on reflection of his dark-haired, cute co-worker in the mirror.

"Woah..." Josh mumbled, reaching up to the breasts he could see in the mirror hanging free. But when he looked down, he saw only his own chest, free from the restrictions of Emily's bra. Nervously, he reached up to his chest and looked in the mirror. He could see his reflection grabbing 'her' breasts and squeezing them, and Josh felt himself getting turned on a little. He stopped abruptly, noticing how steamy the room was getting again. He peeled Emily's knickers off and saw his junk hang loose, yet in the mirror... he had a neatrly trimmed vagina instead. He refrained from playing with that just now. And so he took his glasses off and hopped into the shower and pulled the curtain behind him.

As the hot water flowed over him, he held his head under it and completely soaked his feminine hair, before pulling it back over his shoulders so it hung down his back. The water felt good, certainly a nice way to wind down after today, given all what had happened. Moaning slightly, Josh peered down at his drenched feet and noticed the blue nail polish Emily usually wore, his fingernails were the same color too, though the polish was slightly chipped on those.

For the next 15 minutes, Josh enjoyed the hot shower and kept massaging his hairless body

"Don't be all night in there Josh, you'll shrivel up." Steven suddenly called thought the door, as he dried Jessica's former hair with his towel. He hadn't even thought that she might have owned a hair dryer, which both girls did as a matter of fact.

"I hear ya buddy." Josh called back, opening his eyes and noticing how much the bathroom now resembled a steam room. "Jesus..." he mumbled, turning the shower off and stepping out finally. A few minutes later he was dry, and he slipped into Emily's favorite pyjamas and her 'indoor' flats before leaving the bathroom and joining Steven in his bedroom for a while to chat about what they'd do tomorrow. Demand to be swapped back maybe? They knew Gemma wouldn't respond well to threat, and besides, she still had her swapping device. Who knows what she'd do to them if they pissed her off.

They'd have a better idea of the direction things were headed tomorrow at work.

121233333331324212121313333234113.content:
Josh groaned as he heard the alarm go off on his phone. Blindly he felt for the phone and felt it on the dresser. "What is going on?" He opened his eyes and noticed how blurry everything seemed and noticed that hair seemed to be obscuring his vision. "Shit it wasn't a dream." He found something that looked to be his new glasses and reached for them and placed them on his face. Almost instantly everything came into focus. The random Anime/Manga posters on the walls, various clothes strewn across the floor, and the television with PlayStation 4 next to it, all of these reminded him that he was currently living Emily's life. He grabbed the Rose-Gold colored iPhone and turned off the alarm. "Why does she have to wake up so early?" He looked further and noticed that she had several different texts from his number.

Josh, sorry I forgot to tell you that I have class this morning. Take Bus 20 to Rotherham University and I will send you my schedule in an email.

~Emily~

He looked at the email app and noticed that there indeed was an email. "Damn it." He grumbled when he noticed that he had less than an hour to get ready and make it to the bus. He quickly did his best to look presentable and got ready for class. Looking through the closet he looked for the most masculine items he could find, a pair of skinny jeans, light blue bra with matching panties, random tight T-shirt, with the black and white converse that he saw last night. Looking in the mirror, Josh did his best to make himself presentable and brushed his new long hair to make sure there wasn't any tangles. Not wanting to look like a clown, Josh didn't try to put on any of the makeup that was on the dresser. Thinking that he looked alright, Josh grabbed the only backpack that was in the room and made his way to the nearest bus stop.

*** Meanwhile across town ***

Liz woke up to a messy looking room. Not wanting to clean or find anything that she might regret seeing. She decided to just leave it alone for later, when Gemma would swap them back. She avoided as much as she could seeing Rob's reflection in the random mirror that were littered around the flat that he shared with Rob's Mum. She was amazed that her large breasts didn't hurt without being supported by a bra and she certainly wasn't going to complain about it. Knowing that Rob didn't need to be at work until later, Liz decided to go and take a shower in order to get the day started.

1212333333313242121213133332341131.content:
The swapped employees got through their days as well as they could before work, with some of them such as Liz coping better than others, such as Rob and Aaron. It was actually a break for those two, and for Mark when it was time to get to work. As everyone trickled into Wilko for the evening shift, Gemma was there watching, and smiling at them all. That is... until she saw Josh, Daniel and most of the other guys were not wearing any make-up whatsoever. Only Steven had made a small effort, applying some of Jessica's lip gloss. "Hiya Jess." She nodded at him as he clicked by in his heels. He returned the nod politely and disappeared upstairs.

"Hi Liz, you do know you're supposed to be here before everyone else right? As supervisor you're supposed to set an example." Gemma addressed Rob as he walked into the store, struggling to put his hair up in Liz's usual ponytail style.

"I.. uh... sorry Gemma, but Liz's son was really annoy...er... hyper today." Rob replied.

Gemma glared at him. "YOUR son you mean. You're Liz remember, and don't forget to act like it." she told him. Gemma didn't mind not seeing Rob with any make-up on, since Liz never usually wore any either. She'd never been the really feminine type when it came to make-up and clothes.

"Yeah, all right." Rob grumbled, nodding his head.

"Good, now head on upstairs to the tea room, we're all going to have a chat." Gemma smirked, even as the last two participants in her little 'experiment', Waggy and Kiran (the new Aaron and Daniel) walked through the door. "Oh and... Liz," Gemma said to Rob again before he went upstairs ahead of her, "Emma and Elizabeth are both in their office upstairs, so they might be wanting a word about the work schedule after I've talked to my 'concerned parties' in the tea room.

Tonight was going to be a normal shift, and there were a lot of the other Wilko staff working, not just the ones Gemma had swapped around. Which meant those individuals would have to act like the people they swapped with so as not to appear 'out of character' to others.

Once up in the tea room, Gemma waited until Rebekah, Natalie, Laura and Charlotte had all left to start their shifts, before closing the door and surveying the life swapped employees sat around the table.

Gemma just took a moment to look over the group, especially the 'girls'. "Now ladies." She paused looking at the feminine looking guys with a bit of hesitation. "You all look a little put together, but yet only one of you had the sense of mind to actually put some makeup on." She looked over at Steven and Jessica's lip gloss on his lips. "But, I think you all need to embrace your new feminine side a little more."

"But how can we do that Gemma?" Rob asked as he continued to struggle to put his hair into a simple ponytail. Liz seeing the amount trouble that he was having, sighed and did it for him. She grabbed the hairbrush out of her, or rather Rob's, purse and did quick work, even with Rob wincing in pain with the tangles that Liz found while brushing his hair.

"Ever heard of YouTube?" Gemma replied back in a sort of demeaning tone. "I'm sure that will help you with what you need to know. Now Jessica here," She gestured over at Steven, whose red hair was down, but brushed out. "had some decency and put on lip gloss at the very least." She then looked over at the girls who were living their male co-worker's lives. "You chaps aren't off scott-free either." She looked over at Emily who was living Josh's life. "Love, why didn't you shave this morning." She brought her hand up to Emily's face and felt the chin. "So scruffy, I don't think that Josh would approve of it. Right?" She turned her head over to Josh.

"Umm... Yeah, I'm usually clean shaven." Josh replied as he brought a rogue piece of his longer dark hair behind his ear.

"Now, I bet most of you thought that I would think about changing you all back tonight right?" She asked the group and most of them felt a sense of relief, beginning to sit up straighter in their seats. "Well, I still think you all need to learn more about your new lives." There was a sense of dread from everyone and the atmosphere in the room seemed to grow dire. "Oh, don't give me that. I'm giving you something that most people would die for. Literally walking in the shoes of the opposite sex. But since I want you all to learn and get the most from your experiences. I will let you talk to your 'Life Partners." She chuckled as she did air quotes for the term she thought was clever. "As you talk to them, know more about them, so that this won't happen again."

"Er... thanks, I think." Steven replied, adjusting his bra strap. "Why didn't you tell me I lived with Josh... um... Emily, whatever?!" he asked Jessica.

Well... more than she was with the other guys." Jessica mumbled.

Again, a wry smile appeared on Jessica's slightly stubbly face. "You should get used to it, because I don't think Gemma is planning on swapping everyone back just yet." she said. "I must remember to shave when I get to your place tonight, this facial scruff is itching."

"My razor is in my bedroom, the shaving gel is in the bathroom cabinet." Steven informed her.

"Cool, thanks." Jessica smiled, as the two continued chatting.

"Hey." Emily replied as she sat down next to Josh. "So were you able to make to class on time?" She wondered as she looked him over. As she looked she tried to see if there was anything that she could talk to him about. Looking at his hair, she noticed that it seemed well taken care of and was glad to see it.

"Yeah, I had a little trouble finding some of your classes, but I was able to make it." Josh answered, thinking about looking across the campus for the buildings. He watched with a bit of fascination as Emily looked him over with a fine tooth comb.

"Well, how was last night?" Liz asked Rob after she had finished putting his blondish-brown hair into her usual ponytail style. She stood there in front of him, hands on hips and not sitting down. She looked serious and Rob felt like he was actually being interrogated. "Did Ethan get his supper? Did you tuck him in at 9:00pm?" 121233333331324212121313333234113122311.content:
"So did you make sure that they both made it to school okay? How about their clothes, were they ever ironed? And dinner?" Waggy seemed to be going a mile a minute ever since she got a chance to talk to him.

"Whoa." Aaron chuckled as he held up both of his hands in an attempt to slow her down a bit. "Yes, I made sure that Jack and Eden made it to school on time. Yes, I made sure that their clothes were ironed and presentable, but it took me a couple tries to get it right." He thought back to last night where he almost burned one of Eden's jumpers, when he left the iron on it while he checked something on the phone. "And dinner was fine, it looked like Dave was nice enough to get it done since we were running a little late. But he certainly left a lot of dishes in the sink though."

"Wow, I'm jealous." She chuckled. "He never cooked dinner for me, but I think he said that he was wanting to try something new." Waggy replied. "But I'm glad that you were able to get everything done and I'm rather impressed that you didn't burn anything down."

1341.content:
The three stood there in dumbfounded silence for quite a while, their widened eyes going back and forth from looking over each other, to looking over their own strange new situation.

They were each dressed in identical costumes. Each working preposterously high, 5 inch black patent leather high heels. The long, mindbogglingly enticing legs stepped into those heels were clad in dark pantyhose that showed them off to best effect. Their identical thighs led up to black, silky panty-like briefs. Atop those briefs, they sported tight-fitting, button up tuxedo shirts, with matching white vests. Their collars were fastened with expertly tied black bow-ties. Over their shoulders, they wore open tuxedo jackets, with tails dangling behind them, swaying and smacking up against their fannies with each movement.

But, more than mere fashion, the three now had what appeared to be identical, clone-like bodies from the neck down! Long gorgeous legs. Tight, broad, athletic asses. Narrow waists. Enormous, enhanced looking breasts. They each had the same, incredibly fit, incredibly attractive, female dancer's body affixed to their noggins. They all stood eye to eye now, with all of them being 5 foot 7 or so in on their towering heels.

Liz looked down at her feet, stepping from off of one high heeled foot to the other, confirming that the long, lovely legs she was looking at, and feeling were indeed her own.

Carly snapped back and forth as she looked at Liz and Steven, before holding her open hands up, staring at the white gloves she was now wearing.

Steven looked down at himself in slack-jawed disbelief. He tentatively began to feel the outline of the large new breasts he seemed to be sporting, with his own gloved hands.

"This isn't me! this isn't my body!!' Carly sounded panicked. "These legs look nothing like mine! My tits aren't this big!!! Who's body is this!!!"

Liz walked over to the wall of mirrors in front of the styling chairs, her high heels clicking on the floor. "You aren't kidding. I have NEVER been in this good a shape." She looked at her reflection. Feeling her cheek with a gloved hand, she whispered "But our heads are still the same. We're still us, just not from the bowtie down..."

Steven turned his attention to other parts of his anatomy. Slowly, nervously, he reached down and felt his smooth, panty-covered crotch for any signs of his apparently missing manhood. He felt an electric, pleasurable tingle as he felt the outline of something very different. "I have a cunt...Jesus...I have a cunt..." he whispered in disbelief.

Carly began to pull on one white glove, and then the other. "I can't seem to <grunt> get these damn gloves off!"

Sitting down on one of the styling chairs, Liz lifted one of her magnificent new legs up and attempted to pull a stiletto shoe off of her foot. "The shoes aren't budging either!" She groaned with the effort. "I am NOT a girl who wears heels. Steven, help me get these damn things off!"

Shocked away from touching his new, feminine form, Steven pranced over on his own heels. With both of his gloved hands prying, he and Liz giving their all, they found their efforts to get the ridiculous footwear off of her feet completely useless.

For the next half an hour, the trio tried to pull their newly produced attire off of bodies that weren't their own, to no effect.

At first, they tried to be clever. Carly attempted to use some of her hair-styling scissors to cut some of her garments off. Liz tried to get the edge of a nail file between her hose-clad foot and the shoe, to no effect. Steven grabbed tried to pry the buttons of his tuxedo shirt open, but found them just as resistant to movement and damage as every other portion of his new outfit.

Finally, their efforts gave way to frustration, nearly hysterical panic, and resignation. Liz stomped around on her heels, trying to break them off from the rest of the shoe. She even tried snapping them on the metal bar of the hair styling chair, to no avail. Carly, tears streaming down her face, pulled at the edges of her outfit like a maddened animal before collapsing to the ground to weep. Steven finally sat down on a stool, looking down at his new outrageously female body with disbelief.

After more than an hour of that, Liz finally attempted to take charge of the situation. "Alright. Enough of that! We're heading to hospital! I don't know what they Hell is happening, or what's become of us, but it's clear bugger all is getting done with us sitting around pouting!"

Steven stood up, he hugged himself, his new knees knocking together nervously. "H-hospital? You mean go out and be seen...like this?!?!" His cheeks flashed crimson.

"What's the alternative?!?! Are you going to hide here in Carly's salon with some strange woman's body attached to your head for the rest of your days?!? This is CLEARLY beyond our ability to deal with!" Liz was flabbergasted by how short-sighted Steven appeared to be.

Carly climbed up onto her high heeled feet, sniffling as she wiped the tears from her eyes. "She's right! At the the very least maybe the Doctors can get us out of these stupid clothes! And maybe the police will be able to track down who stole, or transformed, or replaced our bodies or whatever!!!"

Steven nodded weakly. Liz walked over and took his gloved hands in her own, looking him eye to eye. "Don't worry. At least we're in this with friends. And it's not like we'll be walking there. We just have to get to the van out front and I can drive us to hospital!" Steven gave her a weak smile and quickly nodded his head.

1341.title: ...sexy, leggy, chorus-line dancer's tuxedo...

13412.content:
Steven and Carly looked out the front windows of Beautylicious at the parked van. "So near, and yet so far away, 'eh?" Steven gave her a half smile.

"Yeah..." Carly tried to smile back, but was too petrified to fake it.

Liz paced back and forth, patting her new body's clothing and looking on the desk and countertops of the salon. "Damn it, damn it, damn it!"

"What's wrong Liz?" Carly asked as she and Steven walked back into the salon and watched her frantic behavior.

"I can't find the damned keys to the van! I think they were in my pants pocket when...when whatever happened, happened to us." She teetered a bit, almost tripping on her new stilettos. "These fucking shoes will be the death of me!"

"Good Lord luv, even Steven is doing better on his new heels than you!" Carly smiled as she watched Liz stomp around. Liz stopped in her tracks and laughed despite herself. "You know me, I've never been particularly good at being girly."

"Are you saying I am?!?!" Steven groaned, causing the two women to giggle even more.

As the mirth subsided, Carly spoke up. "So what now?"

Liz shrugged and sighed. "I don't know. I guess we can call for an ambulance or something. "

Steven frowned. He did NOT like the idea of having to face the no doubt bewildered and amused stares of EMTs. Granted, even if they'd managed to drive the van to the hospital he'd eventually have to face hospital staff and the like. "This just keeps getting better and better."

"We'd best not drag our feet. Do you have a cell phone Carly?" Liz inquired.

"Yeah. It's in my purse. I'll fetch it." Carly strutted across the room getting within a few paces of her bag before slowing down and coming to a stop in her new heels. "Do, do either of you hear that?" she asked, cocking her head to listen for some far off sound.

"Hear what, dear?" Liz asked, looking around but oblivious to any strange sound.

Steven tilted his head as well. "I don't hear anything either..."

"Shhhhhh!!!" Carly put her gloved index finger to her lips and shushed him. "I swear, I can hear...music...".

Liz and Steven looked at each other and shrugged their now identical shoulders.

As Carly listened for the music, her right foot began to tap against the floor with a steady, regular rhythm. "I swear I hear it!" She continued to listen.

"Does it have the same beat that your tapping out?" Steven asked as he and Liz approached Carly and continued to listen for themselves.

"Tapping? I'm not..." Carly trailed off as she looked down and saw one of her long new legs was indeed, tapping her pump on the salon's tiled floor in time with the faint music she was hearing.

"I still can't hear it." Steven started walking toward the entrance.

"Uh, guys. I'm not tapping my foot. It's doing it on it's own and I can't make it stop!" Carly sounded concerned.

Liz walked over and looked at her foot, still tapping out with a regular beat. "Carly, I'll see if I can..." she was just about to lean down and see if she could restrain her friend's errant new limb, when Carly's posture went ramrod straight, her gloved hands snapping down and placing themselves on her hips.

"I'm not doing this! I can't make myself stop or move! The music is getting louder!" Carly was beginning to look genuinely terrified eve as her body posed and continued to tap to an unheard beat.

Liz stopped and cocked her head. "Wait a second..." she squinted and furrowed her brow. "...I think I can hear it too!"

"It's old fashioned sounding, isn't it? Like a big band or something?" Carly, despite her helplessness was glad someone else was finally hearing the tune as well.

"I still don't..." Steven stopped as he realized that two feet were now tapping in the room. The trio looked down to see that Liz was tapping her right heel tip in time with the music's beat as well.

"Oh no..." Carly and Liz looked at each other, their faces going pale. An instant later, Liz snapped into a rigid posture as well, posing in the same way as Carly.

"Shit!!! We don't need things to get even weirder!!!" Steven paced back in forth. "Fuck it. I'm calling the ambulance service before I start..." Steven came to a halt, suddenly hearing fast moving, soaring, big band or orchestra music. "No! I have to get to the phone!!!" Steven grimaced as his lovely new body spun around to face his two companions without his permission.

Moments later, the trio all stood in identical, hands on hips poses as they continued to tap their right foot to the strange music. "Well, this is a hell of a development." Liz shook her head and grit her teeth. "I can't do a damned thing to stop myself."

"This is so creepy!" Carly was tearing up again.

"How long do you think we're going to be made to do..." Steven trailed off as all there of their errant bodies suddenly shifted position, tapping out a twin beat with each foot as their identical, delightful legs forced them to march around the center of the room in a circle. Each reached out with their left hand and gripped each other's outstretch wrist, almost like some kind of May Day celebratory dance.

"That answer your question?" Liz grunted in frustration.

The trio continued their merry little circular march to the far off beat for several minutes. "Are either of you feeling tired? I KNOW this would've reduced me to a panting, sweaty mess when I had my own body." Steven asked, genuinely curious and trying to break the monotony.

"Nope. Not in the least." Liz answered. Carly just shook her head no and sniffled.

Finally, the trio broke their circular pattern and started off single file toward the front door, Carly in the lead, Liz in the middle, and Steven bringing up the rear, hands on the hips of the body in front of them like a tap-dancing conga line. "We appear to be departing." Liz sounded resigned.

As they approached the front door, rather than open it, Carly's marching, dancing body extended her long left leg and kicked it smack dab in the middle, shattering it and ripping it from the hinges. The remnants flew out onto the sidewalk before them as they tap danced across the broken glass.

Out onto the side walk, the trio broke their single-file formation and went into a side-by-side three abreast pattern. Carly at the farm right, Liz in the middle, and Steven on the left. Arms linked, they began to march, with and alternating, musical, tap-dancing cadence as they continued to dance and journey out into the night following the strange music.

"What are we going to do?!?!" Carly yelped.

"Not much for the moment, luv. We appear to be passengers on this little trip." Liz answered. With perfectly synchronized tapping strides, the three hapless friends did just that as their new bodies spirited them away.
13412.title: The 3 begin to hear music.

choices: ..uh-oh, the workmen would like a word.
134121.content:
Right leg...TAP. Left leg...TAP. Right leg...TAP. Left leg...TAP. Right leg...TAP. Left leg...TAP.

The three friends marched abreast, their new high heels clicking on the pavement in perfect unison and synchronicity with each other, and the beat of the music they continued to hear. Postures ram-rod straight, great big beautiful tits pushed out, arms linked, long, perfect pantyhose-clad legs carrying them inexorably forward.

Steven, at the far right, his head affixed to a leggy, gorgeous dancer's body identical to his two companions, looked around them as they continued tapping along. "Well, at least we haven't bumped into anyone yet." Having his noggin paired up with such a preposterously feminine body was NOT in his comfort zone when it came to social interaction. He was sure there would be laughing, ridicule, and outright derision.

"Don't be daft!" Liz snapped from the middle of the trio. "If you see anyone, I mean anyone, scream bloody murder! We can't stop ourselves! We need help!"

"I keep hoping I'll wake up and this is just some kind of fucked up nightmare." Carly wheezed at the far right.

The three kept dance-marching, side-by-side, arms linked as they turned a corner and tapped onto the sidewalk of a wider, potentially busier street. As they kept marching onward, they periodically strode into glow of streetlights and signals, illuminating themselves in eerie "stage-lights" as they danced to the beat of someone else's drum.

"Finally, there's someone..." Liz muttered, desperation causing her voice to crack before she kicked into full-blown shouting, "Ma'am! Ma'am! Beg your pardon!!! We need help!!! Please, ring the police or something!!!" she shouted to a little old woman wearing a colorful scarf over her head who was apparently returning home with her knitting.

The old bird stopped, took one look at the oddly dressed, marching threesome, shook her head in disgust, and continued on her way.

"Ma'am!!! Ma'am please!!!" Liz pleaded.

"She's serious! We're in trouble!!!" Carly chimed in.

"Old bitch." Steven muttered as the three continued kick-marching on their way.

A block or two further, they encountered an older, obviously inebriated, balding, overweight gent stripped down to his undershirt sitting on a front stoop, sipping a beer.

"Thank God..." Liz mumbled. "Sir!!! Sir?!?! My friends and I need assistance! Something terrible has happen..."

Before she even finished, the old man raised his beer can and toasted them. "Oy there, sluts!!!"

"Oh for Christ sakes..." Liz mumbled angrily.

"Piss off, you old drunken Hippo!!!" Carly spit out.

"Well, this is going MARVELOUSLY." Steven sighed and shook his head as the body his head was attached too, and those of his two friends continued to dance-trot on their merry way in time with the strange music.

Further down the street, the 3 could see a small group of workmen climbing, and stumbling, out of their truck. They were still clad in their overalls, heavy workbooks, and safety vests. One of them was even wearing a hard hat accessorized with a pair of goggles and sound-dampening headphones, the kind yard and heavy machinery users had to wear.

"Great. More drunks." Steven was NOT thrilled with the idea of approaching a group of burly, loud, laughing workmen who'd just got done with a night at the pub.

"Excuse me!!! You lot!!! We're in trouble!!! Could you ring the police or Emergency services or something!" Liz shouted.

The group of men stood there, dumbstruck at the sight of 3 gorgeous, leggy dancers approaching them in perfectly timed unified marching. All of them looked surprised, some of them started laughing, and a couple were already looking like they were admiring the trio of leggy, big breasted ladies a little too much. "Fuck me! We hit the bloody jackpot!" One of them shouted, the rest of his fellows laughing in agreement.

"We can't stop dancing!!! We need your help!!" Carly squealed.

"I don't know luv, I for one could watch you strut your stuff all night!" one workmen grunted as he did a pelvic thrust, eliciting guffaws from his crew.

"God damn it, we're serious! We need help!!!" Liz was getting increasingly desperate.

The men started to follow the three dancers, observing and admiring them as they took in the strange sight. Some whispered amongst themselves, smiling, winking, and slapping their buddies on the back as they appeared to appraise, rate, and admire the three friends.

"Bloody Hell, this one's a guy!" One of them grunted, finally getting a look at Steven's mug.

"With tits like those, it's don't matter!" Another laughed, getting the rest of the fellas to cackle like hyenas.

"Jesus! Just stop us! Grab us, tackle us, whatever, just please stop us!" Carly shrieked.

The men stopped. "I don't need any more invite than that! Dibs on the cutie with the short blond hair!" one of them broke into a trot to catch up to Carly, throwing his arms around her. Rather than slow her down in any way, shape or form, he ended up being dragged along as the three continued dance-marching onward at the same rate.

'What in the..." the man groaned as he fell, unable to use any of his strength to stop Carly, being pulled forward and off his feet. He ended up tripping, falling and hitting his chin on the ground.

"Shit!" Liz cursed.

A couple more men ran over, one trying to cling to Carly's kicking legs, the other grabbing Liz by the waist. They're efforts proved just as futile as Liz left her would-be "rescuer" behind as he was pulled along and tripped over his own workboots, and Carly's glorious, scissoring legs slammed into the head of her "hero," leaving him sprawled and out of sorts behind them as well.

Some of the mean stopped following them, attempting to help their fallen comrades. The others stopped laughing, suddenly not finding things so damned amusing.

"Please! Keep trying! We can't stop!" tears were rolling down Carly's cheeks now.

"Call the police!!! You morons, call the police!" Liz shouted.

Seeing a young man slowing down, watching his oddly alluring new legs carrying him ever forward, Steven locked eyes with him. Looking over the man, he suddenly had a thought. "Your earmuff things!!! put them on me!!!" Steven shouted, nodding toward the noise-canceling 'phones the young man had on his hardhat.

Confused...no, absolutely bewildered, the man responded to Steven's desperation and trotted up next to him, sliding the headphones onto his head and over his ears.

All of the sounds of the men and his friends and his heels clicking on the pavement became more muted, sounding almost as if they were underwater. But, more importantly than that, Steven no longer heard the eerie big-band music!!!

Slowly, his marching stride started to slacken, going out of step with his two friends. He started to try and force his gorgeous new body to bend to his will, and, in ten or 15 seconds it finally did. He let go of Liz's arm and brought his long new pantyhose-sheathed legs to a standstill. He couldn't hear the music!!! He was in control of himself again!!!

He stood there, catching his breath, his new knees knocking together, as relief and anxiety threatened to overcome him. He looked down at his enormous new breasts rising and falling in time with his heavy breathing. Looking up, he could see, but only barely hear, Liz and Carly, looking back at him over their shoulders, pleading for his help. Their graceful new bodies, practically clones of his own, continued marching onward, arms linked, stilettos tapping away with each step.

Steven looked around at the confused workmen, some just standing there in a daze, others sprawled on the ground injured or unconscious, and cursed his luck upon seeing that none of them had noise-canceling earmuffs on them like their young friend.

As his friends continued on their forced journey, Steven decided to...

135.title: Yet more new story arcs.

choices: Help Natasha and find the thief
1351.content:
Rob and Steven hear a scream outside when they are working out the back warehouse.

They go running outside to see an athetic woman wearing a balaclava and glasses. She's about 5'8" tall with C-cup breasts with a glowing blade tucked into her belt. She happens to be wearing a Wilko top for some reason.

Rob gasps as he watches the woman in the balaclava dump a headless female body in a skip before throwing a screaming female head in after.

Rob runs after the masked woman and tackles her to the ground while Steven investigates the skip.

The masked woman manages to escape from Rob's grasp and easily outruns Rob with her athletic body. But she fails to realise she's dropped the blade.

Rob picks up the strange glowing blade and returns to Steven who is looking in the skip with an open jaw.

Inside the skip is the furious head of their colleague Natasha screaming. Get me out of here. Next to Natasha is a headless female body. If it had a head it would be 5'5" tall. The body had small A-cup breasts and chunky legs.

Little did Rob and Steven realize, that this was the initiation for the latest member of a body theft organisation. The organisation would steal bodies to order for their clients. This new female had obviously stolen a more athletic body to make her job easier.

Rob and Steven jump in the skip to help Natasha.
1351.title: Body Thief with Magic Blade.

choices: Steven tries attaching Natasha's head to the thief's body.
The guys somehow smuggle her head into work.
13512.content:
"What the fuck?!!! Did you catch that bitch? She stole my body!" Natasha screamed, freaking out as Steven picked up her disembodied head. None of them could believe what was happening, especially Natasha.

"She was too fast, she'll be long gone now." Rob shook his head, as he inspected the headless body in the dumpster with them. "Holy shit, this is weird, this body is still warm." he added.

"And Natasha isn't dead despite being decapitated. This is beyond weird mate." Steven said.

Rob stood up in the dumpster and showed Steven and the body-less Natasha the glowing blade the thief had dropped while running. "She obviously used this to steal your body." he muttered.

"But why didn't it kill me?" Natasha cried, still in a panic.

Both guys shrugged. "Priorities. We need to figure out what to do with you." Steven responded, holding Natasha up in front of him.

"We can try and put your head on this body?" Rob suggested, pointing to the headless thief's small-breasted body.

"Or I can smuggle you into work like you are, but how do we explain this to Emma and the others?" Steven added, giving Natasha another choice. With the thief long gone with her body, her options were limited and all poor.

135122.content:
Steven attempted to place Natasha's head on the left over body in the skip.

"No fucking way are you putting my head on that inferior body!" Yelled Natasha.

"But, you need a body. And this is the only one left." Replied Steven.

"I spent years getting my body in great shape. I am not about to lose two cup sizes, three inches in height and this body doesn't exactly look as fit as mine." Natasha continued yelling, almost foaming at the mouth before continuing. "I'd rather just be a head."

Steven didn't know what to say.

"Geez calm down. We're just trying to help!" Rob chimed in.

Steven grabbed an old carrier bag from the skip and put in Natasha's head.

"Hey what are you doing?" protested Natasha.

Steven sighed. "We can't just carry your disembodied head. We have to hide you."

"Hide who!?" yelled an angry Liz accompanied by Emma and Elizabeth.

"We've been looking everywhere for you and we find you slacking out the back." She continued.

Emma grabs the bag off Steven and looks inside.

"Hi!" says Natasha's head nervously.

Emma shrieks at the top of her lungs as Liz and Elizabeth rush over.

Meanwhile the thief was down the road walking towards the local JD Sport. She takes off her balaclava and adjusts her glasses as she lets her long brown hair flow down. She might actually be quite pretty if she didn't wear glasses.

The thief enters the clothing store looking for something less conspicuous to wear. Needing something other than the Wilko top, black trousers and sneakers. She was more of a converse kind of girl anyway. Converse and baggy cargo pants to hide her formerly chunky legs.

But today was time for a change. Time to wear what you always wanted to but couldn't pull it off in your former body.

The thief grabs a pair of tiny denim shorts, a gray vest exposing the midriff and a pair of black flip flops.

She heads to the changing rooms and strips completely naked, admiring her new athletic body. It would be nice to get to know this body a little better, but there was no time. She has a meeting to attend with one of the ring leaders of the body theft organisation.

The thief quickly admired her completely waxed smooth crotch before putting on the denim shorts. It was so short that it exposed a little bit of her perfectly timed ass. She then put on the best opting to leave the bra off. After all she was enjoying the feeling of her larger breasts hanging free (but still pert).

Next the thief put on the flip flops and looked in the mirror smiling. She loved her washboard abs and taller, sexier body.

Leaving the changing rooms the thief leaves behind the Wilko top, bra and knickers, opting to go commando. She takes the trousers and sneakers just in case.

The thief leaves the store without paying. She did just steal a body. She wasn't about to start paying for clothes.

The thief makes her way back towards Wilko and heads into the local Costa and orders a coffee. Once it arrives she takes a seat and awaits her contact.

While taking a sip of her coffee, she notices a tall woman about 5'10" walk in. She was fairly pretty for her age, maybe early forties, but she looked like she had the body of an 18 year old fashion model.

The woman gets her own coffee and sits down to join her.

"You must be Helen." greets the woman.

Replying the thief says. "Yes and you are?"

The woman nearly sneers before returning to her calm demeanor. "You don't need to know my name. Great body by the way. Very athletic. And a decent set of breasts. I guess you've passed your initiation. But where's the blade?"

Helen panicked for a moment. Where was the blade she thought to herself. Did I drop it? Oh no. But she couldn't let the contact know.

"I left it somewhere safe. I didn't want to be seen carrying a blade in public. After all my new outfit doesn't lend itself to hiding things."

"Clever girl." Replied the nameless woman with a wink. "Anyway, here's your first assignment." The woman slips a dossier towards Helen, finished her coffee and walks out, strutting like she's on a catwalk.

Helen opens the dossier. It seems a local Salon owner named Carly is looking for a younger, taller body.

The target was a girl named Rebekah who worked at the local Wilko.

Helen just held her head, grinding her teeth, not believing her luck.

"Oh great! Just my luck. This should have been an in and out job, but not only do I have to steal this body from Wilko, I probably left the blade there too!"

Helen suddenly remembered that she saw an advert on the store front at Wilko. New staff required - immediate start.

Helen finished her coffee and headed back towards Wilko. She didn't want to stay there any longer than required. After all, what if that bitch in the skip recognises her old body.

Added to that Helen didn't want to even see her old body. She hated it. Even if this other girl was wearing it. Although part of her felt a little turned on at the thought of this bitch being downgraded. Little did she know that Natasha just flat out refused to wear her old body.
135122.title: The guys somehow smuggle her head into work.

choices: Back with Steven, Rob and company.
1351222.content:
"Nobody will recognize me! I had a balaclava on. Everything is gonna be fine." Helen muttered as she stepped in through the doors of Wilko and walked up to the help desk, which was manned by a cute blonde employee with braces on her teeth. "Hi, er... I'd like to apply for a job please." Helen said, before casually glancing down at the employee's name badge... 'Rebekah'. Holy shit, what are the odds I bump into her straight away. she thought. However, since she had lost the blade, she had no idea how she was going to get Rebekah's body to it's new owner. She would have to find it ASAP.

"Oh, right, I'll just get one of my managers to take you upstairs." Rebekah smiled, picking up the phone to make a tannoy announcement. She put out a call for Elizabeth to come to the help desk, since the assistant manager was usually the one to conduct interviews.

As Helen waited at the help desk, Rebekah couldn't help but make small talk after they had introduced themselves, since she had no other customers to deal with at that moment. "Wow, you're very fit if you don't mind me saying. You look great!" she complimented Helen.

Helen smirked a little, glancing down at her stolen body, which of course was unrecognizable as Natasha's without her uniform. "Oh thanks, I try to keep in shape you know, lots of sports, the frequent visits to the gym, that sort of thing." Helen told Rebekah, as she sized her up. While not as athletic as Natasha had been, she could see why the salon owner, Carly, would want her cute, younger body for herself.

"I tried the gym once, too much like hard work." Rebekah laughed.

Helen just tilted her head, and scratched her taut backside. "You're super cute and slim already, you don't need to." she told Rebekah, who blushed a little.

Suddenly the clicking of high heels on the floor made both girls look in a certain direction. Elizabeth was there, dressed as always in a feminine skirt suit and heels, and she had a somewhat shocked look on her face. However, she managed to hold it together (despite having seen Natasha's disembodied head). She had left Emma and Liz in the back with Steven and Rob to try and sort that mess out. Conducting an interview was a welcome injection of normality after that. "Yes poppet, what is it?" Elizabeth asked Rebekah.

"Oh, Helen here would like to interview for a job please." Rebekah told her assistant manager.

Elizabeth forced a smile out, and gestured to the door leading upstairs. "Of course, come right this way." she said, knowing the store would probably need someone to replace Natasha anyway.

"Thanks." Helen smirked, noticing that even with her heels on, Elizabeth was only the same height as she was with her new body. She loved being so much taller (5'8") and was glad she'd picked Natasha as her target earlier.

"See you later I hope." Rebekah called after Helen before she disappeared through the door.

"Count on it." Helen replied, somewhat ominously, waving at Rebekah before disappearing upstairs with Elizabeth.

Liam held the device in his fingers and looked it over in amazement. It wasn't a big object, in fact for all intents and purposes it looked a lot like a laser pointer, dark and with a silver button you'd push to shoot out the beam. However, going around the top were buttons of varying colors. Liam wasn't sure where it came from as he had certainly never bought it and had no recollection of having ordered it online. Instead it had been sitting on his nightstand when he'd woken up earlier along with a paper. He'd stuffed both into his pocket before leaving not having had the time to look at either.

So now, after having gotten a good look at the laser pointer looking object he pulled the paper out of his pocket and looked at it. It was a description of the device, it's use and it's functions and Liam could hardly believe it.

According to this, it was a device that made bodysuits of people. What were bodysuits? Well if you slipped it on you would become that person. Just select a color, point it at someone, shoot and a suit is made. The suit would allow you to become someone not only physically but mentally as well with access to everything that makes them themselves. It's the perfect disguise... or so the instructions say. According to those instructions each color has a different function:

Green: Turns the target into a wearable body suit.
Yellow: Knocks the target out creating a copy of them via suit.
Red: User uses it on themselves after putting a suit on to open it and take off the suit.
Blue: Revives someone turned into a suit.
White: Scans a person and stores them as a preset; can store up to five presets but with six options; a sixth scan replaces the first preset, a sevent the second and so on. Each press of the white button goes through each preset. The sixth press/option creates a suit that's an amalgam of all the presets, gender determined by the first preset.
Black: Revives someone turned into a suit but with the personality of the last person to wear them.
Orange: Creates a slave suit that has the mind and personality of the target. When put on by someone else the mind/personality in the suit override them and puts them under the control of the device's owner who can command them in any way they want. BE CAREFUL NOT TO WEAR THIS SUIT YOURSELF!

Furthermore, the note ended by informing Liam that he had been selected as one of the few people to test the device and as such it is attuned to him only. If anyone else attempts to use it then it will act only as a simple laser pointer.

It all seemed a little too much for Liam and he wondered if someone was playing a trick on him. He wasn't the most popular guy a tthe store as a lot of his co-workers considered him lazy and awkward so he wouldn't be too surprised. But a voice.caught his attention before he could ponder further.

"Oh, mornin' Liam," yawned Claire, one of his co-workers. "What are you up to?"

Well if he needed an opportunity to try it..

What's the worst that could happen anyway, he shines a spot on Claire? With that he selected the green button. "I'm becoming you," he said and hit the silver button. There was a blinding green flash and in an instant where Claire had been now stood... well, nothing! Nothing but a pile of skin and clothes. So did that mean that it worked? Without hesitation he scooped up what had been Claire, clothes and all, and dashed into the bathroom and into a stall.

In the stall he took the skin that had been Claire and noticed and opening in the back. Tentatively he opened it wider and placed a leg in and was surprised when his much larger one conformed perfectly to her skinnier one. He then did the same with the other leg. As he put in his arms and pulled the suit up he could feel everything conforming to Claire's shape. Finally he inserted his head and the world seemed to spin for a second.

After that he looked down to see a body that was thin and boyish, with small tits. "Oh god," he said in Claire's voice as he ran her slim fingers over her stomach and then up to the chest and then... "Jesus fuck!" he exclaimed as he tweaked a nipple. Claire's tits might have been small but they were still sensitive. Deciding he would have time to mess around later he started grabbing her clothes. He had to admit that boyish figure or no there was something sexy about sliding her underwear on or putting on her bra. After putting on her clothes he exited out of the stall and at the sink looked himself over in the mirror.

"Christ, I can't believe this shit is real," he said as he ran hands along his cheeks and neck to re-verity that everything was really happening. "Claire wouldn't have been my first choice but all things considered," he said as he looked himself over again, he'd never thought much of it before but there was something attractive about Claire's androgyny, "I kinda like it."

"You like what, Claire?"

Liam turned to the door and his heart nearly skipped a beat as he saw Kiran. Kiran was a cute girl and being close to the same age as Liam was one of the few other employees to not treat him with scorn. Liam couldn't help but like her but then she went and got herself a boyfriend and Liam felt heartbroken. He would never be able to enjoy her soft voice or likely soft body in the way he wanted to... well until now at least. The device worked, he knew that much now. He could just zap her the same way he zapped Claire, just get out of Claire and into Kiran. Maybe ruin her relationship with her boyfriend while he's at it.

But did he want to be that petty? He just wanted to experience Kiran's cute body and besides he was liking the feeling of being Claire so far and was considering seeing if he could get through her shift; after all he was such a slacker that if he didn't show up it wouldn't be abnormal. That's what the yellow button was for; he could just create a Kiran suit and enjoy being her in the privacy of his home.

But then why stop at just Kiran? That white button seemed interesting, storing presets it had said? Yeah with that he could get a few and make himself a nice collection of suits. Kiran would be in that group of course. There were also others he would strongly consider too: Mona, his pretty Iranian co-worker, and Ellie, the nice full-figured new girl, were top of the list. Jenny, his older sister, was another one to give him someone older but not too old. There was also Abby, a year nine girl in his neighborhood. Someone his sister had babysat when she was younger. Like the others she was cute and it let him be someone younger without being too much younger.
15533.title: The Bodysuit Device

155331.content:
Liam sighed as he mentally went through all of his options one last time but in the end what he was about to do was obvious. At the end of the day, Liam just didn't have any feelings towards Claire. Sure, she was cute in her own way and the parts of her personality that Liam currently had access to were interesting but Liam just didn't have any connection to her. The only reason he was in her skin at all right now was because she was the one that he happened to test the pointer on first.

Kiran, on the other hand, was a girl that Liam had strong feelings for since his first day of work. It wasn't only that Kiran was incredibly cute, but was also because she was one of the very few people that actually gave Liam the time of day. It was because Kiran had always been genuinely friendly towards Liam and showed compassion towards him in a way that no one else ever had, including his parents and older sister.

"I just love being in a woman's body" Liam said with a grin on his stolen face as he removed the pointer from Claire's pocket and pressed down the green button. "I can't wait to give yours a try" he said, quickly looking over Kiran's form. The 19 year old, was a petite girl, standing at just under 5'0" tall, and had dark brown hair which was tied in a pony tail that fell about midway down her back. Her B-cup breasts pressed against her red employee polo shirt and her slim legs were hidden by the loose fitting work pants that most of the employees wore. Seeing her like this made Liam even more excited to get to try on her body and see what was under there up close and personal.

Liam quickly pointed the device at Kiran and pressed the silver button before the girl even had a chance to react to his statement. Just like before, a green light emanated from the remote which briefly blinded Liam. Once his vision returned, he noticed the pile of skin and clothes where Kiran was standing only seconds before. Just like last time, Liam quickly picked up the pile and ran to the bathroom. This time around Liam naturally ran right into the woman's bathroom, not thinking anything of it since that was Claire's instinct and Liam had conscious and unconscious access to all of her memories as long as he was inside of her skin. He then entered a stall and put Kiran's skin onto the toilet seat in front of him. "Oh man, that was exhilarating!" Liam exclaimed in Claire's voice as he looked at the device in his hand. The power that this small lazer pointer gave to Liam was unbelievable. He was practically a god and so far he hadn't even done anything more than turn a few people into costumes. Imagine the things he could do once he really learned how to use it.

It was clear that the next skin that Liam wore was going to be Kiran's and that he was going to be staying in her skin for quite some time. The question right now was what to do with Claire's skin once Liam removed it. The simplest thing to do would be to just get into Kiran's skin, use the blue button on Claire, and leave the stall before she was oriented enough to realize that Liam was in there with her. Then Claire could continue her day as if nothing had happened and Liam could carry out his day as Kiran, which was his main goal at this point.

Liam's second option was to get into Kiran's skin and then use the black button on the Claire skin. If the instructions for the pointer were to be believed (and Liam suspected that they were given that he was currently wearing Claire's skin) that would revive Claire but with Liam's personality still in the driver's seat. Liam had to admit that the idea of having another him to bounce ideas off of was pretty amazing and Claire was pleasant enough that he wouldn't mind having her body as a companion to him. However, that raised a question that Liam wasn't so sure he wanted answered. The instructions of the pointer made it clear that the device was heard to only work if he was the one using it. But Liam was able to still use the device while wearing Claire's body, which meant that the pointer could tell that it was actually him in a suit and not the real Claire. Would it also know that another version of him wasn't the real one, or would it work for the second him as well? The last thing that Liam wanted was a civil war, so maybe he should take it easy on putting his personalities into skins until that was all figured out.

info.brief_description: Another trait swapping story with the store employees and their families/friends.
info.description:
Wilko is a discount hardware store in the British town of Rotherham, and is situated in the town center, surrounded by other businesses. Among these other businesses is a beauty salon named Beautylicious, a small cafe called The Bread basket, a florists called The Rose Garden, a book and stationary store, W.H Smiths and a clothing store, Internacionale.

Most of the characters will be the same as in the other stories, particularly the fourth and fifth stories, but some characters will have been replaced with new ones. Plots can take place outside of Wilko of course, as long as the story's characters are used. Other characters may be introduced as the story progresses.

She's friendly and a good manager, and to work she wears a short-sleeved white blouse, a pair of boot-cut, black, women's slacks and a pair of black, 2-inch heeled shoes. She's married to Kyle, 42, and has a daughter, Alice, 14.
